synopsis.text: The celestial realm of idol music witnesses a new wave of competition as the vibrant vocalists of ST☆RISH and QUARTET NIGHT strive to outshine the rising stars, HE☆VENS. The anime's narrative unfolds from the thrilling cliffhanger of the previous season, where the rivalry to open the prestigious Triple S international sporting event reaches new heights. Amidst the chaos triggered by HE☆VENS' unexpected interference, a groundbreaking proposal from QUARTET NIGHT paves the way for an unprecedented three-way contest. As the groups set their sights on a new stage, HE☆VENS vows to exact revenge, promising a thrilling spectacle of music, drama, and ambition.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
